categories.name: Web
categories.description: Everything you need for REST endpoints, HTTP and web formats like JSON

categories.name: Data
categories.description: Accessing and managing your data (RDBMS, NoSQL, caching, transaction management, etc)

categories.name: Messaging
categories.description: Send and receives message to various messaging systems (AMQP, KAfka etc)

categories.name: Core
categories.description: Core Quarkus components: engine, logging, etc.

categories.name: Cloud
categories.description: Useful for Cloud Native deployments platforms like Kubernetes and cloud providers

categories.name: Security
categories.description: Everything you need to secure your application

categories.name: Integration
categories.description: Connectors to read to write from a skew of systems (file, S#, Twitter, etc)

categories.name: Compatibility
categories.description: Support for alternative programming models on Quarkus

categories.name: Alternative languages
categories.description: Support for other JVM based languages
